name: Seventh Sight
description:
Install instructions

Thank you for trying out my game!

To begin the fun you need:

1) Uncompress the .Zip File

2)  Steam opened (Be sure you are in the same download region as your friends (Steam Settings->Download->Download Region)

3) Open the game

4) Invite your friends through the steam interface (Shift+Tab) or hit the Invite Friend button

5) Have fun!
